summary: This document is an email chain from October 29, 2021, discussing coordination between the Manhattan District Attorney's Office (DANY) and other parties regarding an interview with a victim in a case related to Leon Black. The emails involve internal deliberation about sharing interview notes and speaking with the victim's counsel before proceeding.

persons.name: Leon Black
persons.context: The email chain's subject line references Leon Black, indicating the correspondence is related to matters involving him.

persons.name: AUSA
persons.context: An AUSA is cc'd in an email as the person familiar with the victim and best to speak with about her.

persons.name: ADA
persons.context: An ADA from the Manhattan District Attorney's Office is part of the team seeking to speak with the recipient about a victim.

connections.description: The AUSA is being connected to the ADA from DANY to discuss a victim, indicating inter-agency coordination on a case.

events.title: DANY inquiry regarding victim interview
events.description: The Manhattan District Attorney's Office reaches out to coordinate speaking with a victim or FBI agent related to a case involving Leon Black.

locations.name: Manhattan District Attorney's Office
locations.context: The office initiating the inquiry and correspondence.

locations.name: New York County
locations.context: Jurisdiction of the District Attorney's Office involved.

keyFacts: The Manhattan District Attorney's Office (DANY) is actively investigating a matter related to Leon Black as of October 2021.
The correspondence involves coordination about interviewing a victim, with consideration given to consulting the victim's counsel first.
There is inter-agency communication between the District Attorney's Office and a federal AUSA regarding the victim.
The subject line and context indicate Leon Black is a central figure in the investigative matter being discussed.
